attributes.action: take immediate action to halt, and reverse, the unacceptable increase in the level of violent and antisocial youth crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: knifings, shootings, beatings, drunkenness, murder, mayhem, intimidation, violence, illiteracy, innumeracy - what more do I need to say?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
